item.title: How to Use wxWidgets with Visual Studio 2022
item.description: This post will guide you on how to build wxWidgets from source and use in your project. First of all go to wxWidgets.com/downloads and then download the Windows ZIP file from the Source code section. Now you can make a folder with the name SDKs (or whatever you prefer) and unzip the downloaded the source code in that folder. If you created the SDKs folder in C drive then right now your path to source code directory would be like this C:\SDKs\wxWidgets-3.
